Workflow.Name: DEPRECATED | SETUP REQUIRED | Admin | Find and add admins as owners for apps that leverage certain
Workflow.Description:
This flow scans your environments for apps that use certain connectors (specified by editing the Flow) and adds admins as owners.
Consider using DLP Policies, and blocking connectors instead.
